## Creating a vector of age

The age of five subjects are given as follows :

-   5

-   8

-   12

-   15

-   4

```{r Age of subjects}
# Defining the age of five subjects
age <- c(5, 8, 12, 15, 4)
age
```

---

## Creating a vector of height

The height of five subjects are given as follows:

-   110

-   127

-   140

-   165

-   103

```{r Height of subjects}
# Defining the age of five subjects
height <- c(110, 127, 140, 165, 103)
height
```

---

# Plotting the Age vs Height Plot

```{r Age vs Height Graph}

plot(age, height)
```
